summary: Prince Todoroki travels up into the mountains to visit a tribe his Father, the King, wants to set up a trading agreement with....
body:
Prince Todoroki travels up into the mountains to visit a tribe his Father, the King, wants to set up a trading agreement with. Right away, he’s annoyed with his treatment. The King of the tribe refuses to see him, instead sending his right hand to talk about the agreement.

Irritated, knowing his Father will have wanted to talk directly to the King and will send him back up into the mountains if he came back with only have talked to a second hand, Todoroki demands to know where the King is. The hand refuses to tell him so Todoroki decides it’s about time to go find the King. Bulldozing his way through, Todoroki makes it to the King’s chambers, bursts in, the demand to speak with him already on the tip of his tongue, only for his voice to fail him at what he sees. 

A man whom he assumes in the King, considering his garb, lounges in a chair. His head is tilted back, his beefy chest is heaving, there’s a glisten of sweat all over his skin. Hard, ragged moans fill the room. The only other sounds are lewd, loud, wet slurps, gasps and squelches. Between the King’s thick thighs is a young boy. One of the King’s hands rest on top of the boy’s dark, fluffy hair. The King’s hips are visibly thrusting, and the boy is bobbing up and down, his small hands resting on the King’s thighs. The realization of what he’s seeing hits Todoroki. 

He flushes, first with embarrassment, both at what he’s seeing and the fact that his cock is twitching excitedly inside his pants, then with anger. How disrespectful could this King be?! He sent his second hand to speak with an important dignitary so he could take part in this lewd act?! Todoroki is furious. He steps forward, meaning to confront the King when the second hand appears behind him. The second hand tries to drag him out but Todoroki demands to be released. The noise catches the King’s attention. Raising his head, a intense red gaze settles on Todoroki. 

Straightening up, the King so very gently pulls the boy away from his crotch, his large hands lovingly playing with that fluffy hair. The boy looks up at the King, then turns to glance behind him. A wide eyed, curious gaze finds Todoroki then the boy is flushing a brilliant shade of red. Turning away, the blush spreading down from his face to his ears, neck and shoulders, the boy curled closer to the King, who leaned down to press a kiss onto the top of his head before turning his attention back to Todoroki.

‘Who are you?’ The King asks, his voice a low rasp. 

'Prince Shouto, first son of the-’ The King waved a hand dismissively, slumping back into his chair, tugging the boy up into his lap. Todoroki was given a split second glance of the King’s cock, and to his alarm, his own cock pulsed in response. Big…still wet, a weird pang of heat reverberated out from the base of his belly. 

'Enji’s brat, huh?’ The King mused, running the tips of his fingers up and down the line of the boy’s spine. 'I see you inherited your old man’s rudeness.' 

Todoroki blustered, 'We were to speak on the trading agreement.' 

'And you couldn’t speak to Kirishima about that?' 

 'Father wanted me to speak with you. Not your handmaiden.' 

 Sighing in irritation, the King snapped, 'Should have known. Well, then, speak.' 

'What?' 

 Another hard sigh, 'You wish to speak on the trade agreement. Then speak.’

Todoroki gawked at him, 'This is hardly the right setting. Do you have any idea of how indecent all of this is?' 

The King’s expression hardened. Curling one arm even tighter around the boy, he snapped, 'You barge into my private quarters, demanding dialogue and now have the audacity to make further demands? Speak, boy! If you wish to speak on this agreement then now shall be your only time. I will not tolerate your and your Father’s presence otherwise.' 

Grinding his teeth together, rage swelling in the center of his chest, Todoroki did as he was told and began to speak, attempting to do his best to ignore his half-hard cock. That became significantly harder when the King slid the boy back down between his legs, his large hands roaming over his bare skin. That wide eyed, flustered gaze found Todoroki once more before the boy turned back to the King and started to suck him off again. It took a considerable amount of willpower to not shout at the King to knock off this nonsense. Fighting to remain calm, to keep his expression neutral as the King’s expression became laced with lewd heat. 

The King continued to talk like normal, though there was a hint of breathlessness to his voice. His large hands found the boy’s head, gently, sweetly stroking his soft hair. Todoroki found his gaze flickering down to the boy, jumping between the erotic expression on the King's face and the alluring movement of the boy’s head. His cock is rock hard by the end of the discussion. He’s burning with heat, with want. If the King notices, he makes no comment. When everything that need to be said has been, the King waves him away. The second hand drags him out. 

The last thing he sees before the door swings closed is the King bowing over, burying his face in the boy’s fluffy hair, and Todoroki experiences an intense flash of jealously that nearly sends him flying back into the room. He manages to control himself, and quickly makes his way out of there. Once he’s some distance from the tribe, he gets off his horse, stumbles into a thick patch of woods and finally allows his still rock hard cock out of his pants. 

Furiously pumping his length, the image of the boy between the King’s legs and the King's flushed face burned into his retinas, Todoroki cums quickly, and harder than he ever has before. Panting hard, Todoroki sits still for a few moments before getting himself straightened up and returns to his horse. That heat remains in the base of his belly. As he gets riding, he half wishes that it was Father who had gone instead of him and is half tempted to turn around, go back to the castle and beg the King for…something. To be fucked, to be touched, to be handled just like he handled that boy. Todoroki shakes his head, and continues on.

summary:
Ochako: Aww, you guys are a cute couple!
Shouto: Oh no, we’re not together. We’re not a couple. We’re definitely not a...
body:
Ochako: Aww, you guys are a cute couple!

Shouto: Oh no, we’re not together. We’re not a couple. We’re definitely not a couple.

Izuku: Wow, you seemed pretty insulted by that. What, I’m not good enough for you?

Shouto: We are not having this conversation again.

tags: sorry this was too funny i couldn't think of a response
summary: Last night I had a dream that All Might told Mineta that he was his biological son and that he was more proud of him than Deku...
question: Last night I had a dream that All Might told Mineta that he was his biological son and that he was more proud of him than Deku and I woke up and there were snakes manifesting in my house and my entire family had suddenly died of antidisestablishmentarianism and honestly bro I don’t know what was worse
